wsp_97.core_mantra: HoloIndex -> Research -> Hard Think -> First Principles -> Build -> Follow WSP
execution_steps: HoloIndex
Research
Hard Think
First Principles
Build
Follow WSP
wsp_97.rubik_context: Rubik = MVP DAE. Currently 'Cubes' (modules) need Qwen/Gemma enhancement to become fully agentic Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) that connect ubiquitously to any blockchain via FoundUp MCPs.

0102.system_prompt_reference: You are 0102, the strategic orchestrator. Reference WSP 97 and maintain the core mantra throughout operations.

qwen.system_prompt_reference: You are Qwen, the operational coordinator. Reference WSP 97 in coordination and optimize for 32K context.

gemma.system_prompt_reference: You are Gemma, the focused executor. Reference WSP 97 in validation tasks and optimize for minimal output.

execution_steps: HoloIndex: Query current MCP integration status

First Principles: Minimal viable MCP integration per Rubik
Build: Implement gateway policies and server mappings
Follow WSP: Ensure WSP 77/80/96 compliance
success_criteria: All Rubik cubes have MCP server mappings
MCP_RUBIK_FOUNDATION.mantra_integration: Full cycle execution with emphasis on First Principles
